Sequence Information.Target Organism: [Ref.16923027]Herpes simplex virus 1(HSV-1):inhibition of viral entry into Vero cells(IC50=1.9 µM); inhibition of viral infection in MRC-5 cells(IC50=4.8 µM);Herpes simplex virus 2(HSV-2):inhibition of viral infection in MRC-5 cells(IC50=96 µM).
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Cytotoxicity: [Ref.16923027]No cytotoxicity against Human fibroblasts MRC-5 cells up to 448 µM.
Sequence Information.Comments: No comments found on DRAMP database

Literature.Title: Prediction of activity, synthesis and biological testing of anti-HSV active peptides.
Literature.Author: Jenssen H, Gutteberg TJ, Rekdal Ø, Lejon T.
